issue.title: About the point of keeping "buffer" definition
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Since the very first version of easySDI, a buffer can be define on an order.
This functionnality has gone through all versions but doesn't seem to be used.

Actually, for now, a buffer can be defined in the basket but the extract orders service doesn't expose it. 

So, something has to be done to make the situation consistent : 
- keep the buffer, and then expose it with the service
- get rid of the buffer, and then remove all references to it in the shop and basket



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
